subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: Anthony Kim, Sergio García, Phil Mickelson and Camilo Villegas are the fab foursome at the top heading into the third round of the $7 million finale in the FedEx Cup race.
snippet: Anthony Kim, Sergio García, Phil Mickelson and Camilo Villegas are the fab foursome at the top heading into the third round of the $7 million finale in the FedEx Cup race.
